author: dkkm10
title: A Verify and Pay System
description: Blockfrost.IO does not experience adoption because there is no way for one to pay out many people for authentic work through blockchain based on x, y and z adjustable factors.

author: thiago.ouros
title: Google Search Blockfrost
description: Blockfrost needs to be better known among devs, as does Ethereum's Infura, for example. One of the ways to achieve this goal is the production of SEO-oriented educational content.

author: astroboysoup
title: CardanoPress, A Plugin for Builders
description: To build with an API such as Blockfrost, you need to understand frontend development, REST APIs, Cardano transactions and more technical web development capabilities. This is a barrier to adoption.

author: jrepusseau
title: Digital Twin platform
description: Blockchain improves supplychain traceability and transparency and keep immutable records. Current solutions come with high cost (100 to $1500 a month), high complexity of deployment and development.

author: quirin.schlegel
title: Cardano Script Explorer 🔎📜
description: There is currently no Cardano Blockchain Explorer, that focuses on script data.

author: lpmaho
title: MLabs - CTL Blockfrost Backend
description: Making Blockfrost easily accessible to dApp developers as the default, regardless of all other technical choices, will help Blockfrost adoption grow first and foremost.

author: venomstyx
title: Unreal Engine Integration
description:
Interest in blockchain is growing, yet Unreal lacks Cardano integration. 
Projects use other chains, develop custom solutions, or lose interest.

author: ngoluuduythai37
title: Watch Wallet for Cardano
description:
There is currently no Cardano watch wallet and open UI kit for developed mobile and watch wallets to help build applications on Blockfrost.
https://youtu.be/E2NWEHySFZI

author: nebiyus
title: Tutorial on Building a wallet
description: Like with all new products there is a fear of the unknown, and Blockfrost is no exception.
